data.eml:eml: Additions of new species to Thelepus (Thelepodidae), with description of a new Terebellides (Trichobranchidae) from Taiwan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hsueh, Pan-Wen, Li, Kuo-Rong (2017): Additions of new species to Thelepus (Thelepodidae), with description of a new Terebellides (Trichobranchidae) from Taiwan. Zootaxa 4244 (3): 429-439, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4244.3.10
